text: Ainerigone is a monotypic genus of Asian dwarf spiders containing the single species, Ainerigone saitoi. It was first described by K. Y. Eskov in 1993, and has only been found in Japan, and in Russia. ==See also== * List of Linyphiidae species ==References== Category:Linyphiidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Asia Category:Spiders of Russia
title: Ainerigone
